dcterms:description: A private Thai-English job posting dataset consisting of 28,844 job postings from a renowned recruitment website in Thailand, including job titles, job descriptions, and skills.

dcterms:description: A standardized system of the European Union for categorizing skills, competencies, qualifications, and occupations, used for validation and testing.

dcterms:description: A dataset designed to understand job titles through skills, used for training and evaluation in job title representation tasks.
